department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: The Request for Proposal (RFP) is for the acquisition of Roll-up Solar Shades including delivery and installation to Montreal, Quebec.
description: Reissue of Solicitation of Offers. This solicitation of offers cancels and supersedes previous solicitation of offers number EF319-240530 dated August 29, 2023 with a closing of October 10, 2023 at 14:00 EDT. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to Offeror's who offered on the previous solicitation. Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing this Request for Proposal for the acquisition of roll-up solar shades including delivery and installation to Montreal, Quebec. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Notice: Roll-up Solar Shades

**Solicitation Number:** WS4056863751
**Publication Date:** November 16, 2023
**Closing Date:** December 5, 2023 at 14:00:00, Eastern Standard Time

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal for the acquisition of roll-up solar shades, including delivery and installation, to Montreal, Quebec.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Montréal, Quebec
* **Expected Contract Period:** July 28, 2024 ( tentative)

**Offers Evaluation Criteria:**

* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Proposal Submissions:**

Submissions must be made in accordance with the solicitation requirements and must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

**Contact Information:**

Corine Lavoie, Contract Manager
Email: [corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:corine.lavoie@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Notice URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18029721?extsite=MTgwMjk3MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Disclaimer:

This tender notice is subject to the provisions of the Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) between suppliers and the Contracting Entity.
